name: Go Skateboarding Day NYC
description: Annual celebration of skateboarding. Group skate through the LES, ending at Tompkins Square for demos, music, and giveaways.

name: KCDC Bowl Jam
description: Bowl contest and jam session hosted by KCDC. All ages, all levels. Prizes from local shops and sponsors.

name: Open Streets Skate Session
description: Community skate session on the Open Streets corridor. Beginners welcome — boards and helmets available to borrow.

name: Board Room NYC Launch Party
description: Celebrating the launch of Board Room NYC — your guide to NYC skate shops. Live chat, giveaways, and featured shop spotlights.

name: Brooklyn Banks Reunion Session
description: Old school meets new school at the legendary Brooklyn Banks. Bring your board and your stories.
